hero.title: Kiro Luxury Furniture
hero.subtitle: We design and manufacture luxury furniture that reflects your unique style

about.title: About Us
about.description: At Kiro Luxury Furniture, we believe that furniture is more than just decor pieces. It's a reflection of your personality and lifestyle. Since our inception, we have been committed to delivering the highest levels of quality and craftsmanship in every piece we create.
about.missionText: To create luxury custom furniture that meets our clients' unique needs while maintaining the highest standards of quality and design.
about.visionText: To be the premier destination for custom luxury furniture in the region, known for innovation, quality, and exceptional service.

design.title: Custom Design
design.description: We design custom furniture that perfectly fits your space and style

manufacturing.title: High-Quality Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: We use the best materials and techniques to ensure exceptional quality

installation.title: Professional Installation
installation.description: Our specialized team ensures perfect installation of every piece
